eu.opends.hmi

Class LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.hmi.PresentationModel
      • eu.opends.hmi.LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel

  • public class LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel
extends PresentationModel
    This class represents the presentation of a local danger warning. The distance between the moving car and a danger area is measured in order to update the distance information in the presentation. Each SIM-TD presentation model has its own appId and furthermore each local danger warning has a typeId and prioritisation.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel

        public LocalDangerWarningPresentationModel(Car car,
                                   com.jme3.math.Vector3f targetPosition,
                                   java.lang.String localDangerWarningName,
                                   int displayDurationMillis)
        Initializes a local danger warning presentation model by setting the positions of the car and danger area, the minimum distance from the danger area to cancel the presentation and the name of the warning. By this name, SIM-TD parameters like appId, typeOfWarning and currentPrioritisation can be looked up.
        Parameters:
        car - Car heading towards the danger area
        targetPosition - Position of the danger area's center
        localDangerWarningName - Name of the local danger warning (internel representation)
        displayDurationMillis - Determines the start time of the warning. Note that this is not the same as the "delay", since it depends on the distance to the target and may be updated later. A value n > 0 means: "display n seconds prior to the target arrival". 0 means: "display immediately" (default to leave behavior like previously). -1 means: "use the default presentation time", which might be a user-adapted/warning-specific setting.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception, if name of local danger warning is unknown

      • createPresentation

        public long createPresentation()
        Creates a local danger warning presentation task on the SIM-TD HMI GUI. This data will only be sent to the HMI bundle once.
        Specified by:
        createPresentation in class PresentationModel
        Returns:
        Presentation ID. If an error occurred, a negative value will be returned.
